name: A Simple Fetch Quest
description:
Use the arrow keys to play.

You are a tired villager and would just like to go back to bed. Unfortunately, a dragon has taken all of the valley's sheep, and you've been volunteered to go and get them.

Both the Bitsy engine and the forest zone tile pack were created by Adam Le Doux. The rest of the artwork (as well as the cover image) are by yours truly. :)

(And yes, the game is supposed to be free to play!! The purchase option is just a tip, or if you really wanted to see the code under the game or something, lol.)
